mapper.insert: insert into User ( updateTime , createTime , status , phone , password , name ) values( #{updateTime} , #{createTime} , #{status} , #{phone} , #{password} , #{name} )
mapper.update: update User set updateTime=#{updateTime}, createTime=#{createTime}, status=#{status}, phone=#{phone}, password=#{password}, name=#{name} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select u.updateTime, u.createTime, u.status, u.phone, u.password, u.name, u.id from user where u.id=#{id}
